title: Bubble Gum Zac possible all Zac Chroma bug
body: I was in a game with an enemy Zac using a chroma and whenever he would use an ability it made the sounds of picking a health pack up in aram. but ofc we were in a summoners rift normals. and it was really loud too.

replies.body: Thanks for the report - I'll look into this today! :)
